concept.title: Glossary code
concept.shortdesc: The code below illustrates the code for the two terms shown.

section.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!DOCTYPE glossentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DITA Glossary//EN" "http://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/v1.1/OS/dtd/glossary.dtd"> <glossentry "xml:lang="en-us" id="confcall"> <glossterm>conference call</glossterm> <glossdef>a telephone call in which a caller may speak with several people in different locations at the same time </glossdef> </glossentry>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!DOCTYPE glossentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DITA Glossary//EN" "http://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/v1.1/OS/dtd/glossary.dtd"> <glossentry id="fcc"> <glossterm>Federal Communications Commission</glossterm> <glossdef>a government agency that regulates and oversees communications by radio, television, wire, satellite, and cable</glossdef> <glossBody> <glossPartOfSpeech value="properNoun"/> <glossSurfaceForm>Federal Communications Commission (FCC) </glossSurfaceForm> <glossAlt> <glossAcronym>FCC</glossAcronym> </glossAlt> </glossBody> </glossentry>
